text: Ptychosalpinx is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Species== Species within the genus Ptychosalpinx include: * Ptychosalpinx altilis † (Conrad, 1832) * Ptychosalpinx globulus (Dall, 1889) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Ptychosalpinx
